mention.text: The challenge put to The Times 's critics
GOING , ` GONE WITH THE WIND ' Still regarded by die-hard nostalgists as the greatest Hollywood film ever made , '' Gone With the Wind ''
the most modern aspects of a movie that 100 years from now will be regarded as a period piece
